pkgmetadata.longdescription: Real Time Monitoring of Asset Markets: Bubbles and Crisis // Apply the popular real-time monitoring strategy proposed by Phillips, Shi and Yu (2015a,b;PSY) doi:10.1111/iere.12132, doi:10.1111/iere.12131, along with a new bootstrap procedure designed to mitigate the potential impact of heteroskedasticity and to effect family-wise size control in recursive testing algorithms (Phillips and Shi, forthcoming).
